rukus.text: 16|84|Zai na ri, wo yao zai mei ge minzu zhong tuiju yige jianzheng zhe, ranhou, buxindao zhe bude wei ziji bianhu, ye bude xiang tamen taohao.
16|85|Dang bu yi zhe kanjian xingfa de shihou, tamen bude jianxing, ye bude huanxing.

16|86|Dang yi wu pei zhu zhe kanjian tamen de pei zhu de shihou, tamen jiangyao shuo:“Women de zhu a! Zhexie shi women de pei zhu, women ceng she ni er qidao tamen.” Naxie pei zhujiang huida tamen shuo:“Nimen que shi shuohuang de.”
16|87|Zai na ri, tamen jiang xiang an la biaoshi qufu, er tamen suo niezao zhe jiang huibi tamen.
16|88|Buxindao erqie zu'ai zhu dao zhe, wo jiang yin tamen de pohuai er zengjia tamen suo shou de xingfa.

16|89|Wo yao zai mei ge minzu zhong, tuiju tamen zu zhong de yige jianzheng, lai fanzheng tamen, zai na ri, wo yao tuiju ni lai fanzheng zhe deng ren. Wo ceng jiang shi ni zhe bu jingdian, chanming wanshi, bing zuo guishun zhe de xiangdao, enhui he xixun.
